statements: SELECT * FROM media_analysis WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, media_literacy_level FROM media_analysis WHERE critical_thinking_skills > 4.5;
SELECT user_id, media_literacy_level, critical_thinking_skills FROM media_analysis ORDER BY media_literacy_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_analysis WHERE critical_thinking_skills < 3.0 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, media_literacy_level + critical_thinking_skills AS total_score FROM media_analysis;
SELECT * FROM media_analysis WHERE user_id = 1 AND media_literacy_level > 0.5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, media_literacy_level FROM media_analysis WHERE critical_thinking_skills < 0.3;
SELECT user_id, SUM(media_literacy_level) AS total_media_literacy FROM media_analysis GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_media_literacy > 1;
SELECT * FROM media_analysis WHERE media_literacy_level >= 0.7 OR critical_thinking_skills >= 0.8 ORDER BY user_id, id;
SELECT AVG(media_literacy_level) AS average_media_literacy, MAX(critical_thinking_skills) AS max_critical_thinking FROM media_analysis;
SELECT * FROM media_literacy_levels;
SELECT literacy_level, media_usage_hours, literacy_score FROM media_literacy_levels;
SELECT * FROM critical_thinking_skills;
SELECT participant_id, logical_reasoning_score FROM critical_thinking_skills;
SELECT id, literacy_level, media_usage_hours, literacy_score FROM media_literacy_levels;
SELECT * FROM media_literacy_levels WHERE id = 1
SELECT literacy_level, media_usage_hours FROM media_literacy_levels WHERE literacy_score > 80 ORDER BY media_usage_hours DESC
SELECT participant_id, logical_reasoning_score FROM critical_thinking_skills WHERE problem_solving_score < 70 AND logical_reasoning_score IS NOT NULL ORDER BY logical_reasoning_score ASC
SELECT id, literacy_level FROM media_literacy_levels WHERE literacy_level LIKE 'Adv%' OR media_usage_hours > 10
SELECT id, literacy_level, media_usage_hours, literacy_score FROM media_literacy_levels WHERE literacy_score <= 50 AND media_usage_hours BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT student_id, media_comprehension_score, critical_thinking_score FROM MediaLiteracyLevels;
SELECT student_name, age, grade_level FROM StudentDetails ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT student_id, logical_reasoning_score, problem_solving_score FROM CriticalThinkingSkills WHERE logical_reasoning_score > 80;
SELECT student_name, department FROM StudentDetails WHERE department = 'Science';
SELECT * FROM MediaLiteracyLevels JOIN StudentDetails USING (student_id);
SELECT * FROM MediaLiteracyLevels WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, media_comprehension_score FROM MediaLiteracyLevels WHERE media_comprehension_score > 80;
SELECT student_name, age, grade_level FROM StudentDetails WHERE department = 'Science';
SELECT student_id, logical_reasoning_score, problem_solving_score FROM CriticalThinkingSkills WHERE logical_reasoning_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90;
SELECT * FROM StudentDetails WHERE age < 15 OR grade_level = 'Grade 10';
SELECT * FROM StudentDemographics;
SELECT student_id, gender, age FROM StudentDemographics WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT * FROM CriticalThinkingSkills ORDER BY thinking_skill_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, thinking_skill_level FROM CriticalThinkingSkills WHERE thinking_skill_level > 3;
SELECT student_id, preferred_media_type FROM MediaConsumptionHabits WHERE hours_spent_media >= 5;
SELECT * FROM MediaLiteracyLevels WHERE literacy_level > 3 ORDER BY literacy_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT student_id, literacy_level FROM MediaLiteracyLevels WHERE literacy_level < 2 AND literacy_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT student_id, thinking_skill_level FROM CriticalThinkingSkills WHERE thinking_skill_level BETWEEN 4 AND 7 ORDER BY thinking_skill_level ASC;
SELECT student_id, age, gender FROM StudentDemographics WHERE age >= 15 AND gender = 'female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM MediaConsumptionHabits WHERE preferred_media_type = 'Social Media' OR hours_spent_media > 4 ORDER BY hours_spent_media DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM UserDemographics;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM UserDemographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, literacy_level, literacy_date FROM MediaLiteracyLevels ORDER BY literacy_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, media_type, hours_spent FROM MediaConsumption WHERE hours_spent > 5;
SELECT user_id, thinking_score, thinking_date FROM CriticalThinkingSkills WHERE thinking_score < 50;
SELECT * FROM MediaLiteracyLevels;
SELECT user_id, literacy_level FROM CriticalThinkingSkills ORDER BY thinking_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM UserDemographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, media_type, SUM(hours_spent) AS total_hours_spent FROM MediaConsumption GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, question_number, response FROM SurveyResponses WHERE user_id = 1001;
